text: Nɨbi Klays nop gos lɨnepɨm ak, gos anɨb ak God nop tap sɨbog ñeb tek gɨpɨm. Pen yad ma nepin, yɨp paklel kumen, nɨkɨm yad sogɨnɨgel tek lup akaŋ? Anɨgenɨgabal, nɨkɨm yad ñɨg wayn sɨbog ñɨnɨgel tek dɨl, tap nɨbi God nop sɨbog ñɨbɨm ak sek dɨl, omɨŋal gɨl sogenɨgel, yɨp tep gek mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨgayn. Yad nɨbi ayɨp mɨdupsek mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨgabun.
